textContent:
Caste system: missinterpreted by the west. It's actually two different things: varna (color) and jati (occupation). 

Varna is a broad category inside the societal pyramid (priests, nobles, tradesmen, peasants), outisde of which are the untouchables, those who were of darker skin, conquered by the light-skined aryans. Thus, the term color arises.

Jati is the occupation, the guild of your craft. There's a Jati for pottery, for animal husbandry, for tailoring...
title: Notes on India
textContentHtml:
Caste system: missinterpreted by the west. It's actually two different things: varna (color) and jati (occupation). 


Varna is a broad category inside the societal pyramid (priests, nobles, tradesmen, peasants), outisde of which are the untouchables, those who were of darker skin, conquered by the light-skined aryans. Thus, the term color arises.


Jati is the occupation, the guild of your craft. There's a Jati for pottery, for animal husbandry, for tailoring...
